resources.string:
mDroid Music Quiz is a game which loads music from local SD Card and turn them into exciting music quiz game. 
Different game modes give different gaming experience. 
Here are some quick introduction to those game modes: 
Time Attack: The goal is to answer all questions correctly as fast as possible. 

Memory Ordeal: This mode tests you memory, you want to be as accurate as possible and take your time. 

Sudden Death: This is a very difficulty mode and rule is simple DO NOT pick the wrong one, game over after first mistake. 

Online Challenge: This mode is combination of both death and timed mode. It requires both accuracy and quickness. Most importantly your result will be posted online and compete with other music lover like you.

Congratulations! You have successfully installed mDroid and tons of fun are waiting for you. 

Before you start here are some quick introductions to different game modes. 

Time Attack: The goal is to answer all questions correctly as fast as possible. 

Memory Ordeal: This mode tests you memory, you want to be as accurate as possible and take your time. 

Sudden Death: This is a very difficulty mode and rule is simple DO NOT pick the wrong one, game over after first mistake. 

Online Challenge(Pro version only): This mode is combination of both death and timed mode. It requires both accuracy and quickness. Most importantly your result will be posted online and compete with other music lover like you. 

General Hints: We suggest you have a least 20 song on your device. Insufficient songs will reduce interest of the game. 

You can also check allow repeat in settings page if you do not have enough songs to play with. 

Have Fun!
You do not have enough sounds to complete this quiz continue anyway!? \n(Hint: Change setting to "Allow Repeat" or simply add more sounds.)
You do not have enough sounds you may still play but this may decrease interest of Gameplay.

Goal: Finish the question as fast as you can. 
Score base on time and accuracy. 

Are you ready?!

Goal: Do not make a single mistake. 
Score base on how many question you have answered. 

Are you ready?!

Goal: Be as accurate as possible and take your time. 
Score base on how accurate you are. 

Are you ready?!

Goal: Do NOT pick the wrong answer and finish the question as fast as you can. 
You will be grade on both number of questions you have answered and time to complete them. 

Are you ready?!
